t: Amazon Restaurants in US is shutting down | TechCrunch
s: June 11, 2019 - TechCrunch (among others, we’re guessing) was tipped off to the closure through a source at Amazon familiar with the business’s closing. Amazon confirmed the closure of Amazon Restaurants in the U.S., which ceases to operate June 24.

t: Amazon’s Restaurants delivery service is shutting down | The Verge
s: June 11, 2019 - Amazon will officially end its Restaurants delivery service at the end of this month. “As of June 24th, we will discontinue the Amazon Restaurants business in the US,” an Amazon spokesperson said in a statement.
